resources.string: ControlMiles needs location access to automatically track your driving mileage for IRS compliance.
ControlMiles needs camera access to capture odometer photos for audit evidence.
ControlMiles needs Bluetooth access to detect when you enter your vehicle and start automatic trip tracking.
ControlMiles needs activity recognition to detect when you start driving and automatically begin tracking trips.
ControlMiles needs notification access to alert you when trips are detected and tracked.
